SYSTEM: GeneralOntologies2013.pdf: Página 34
Based on Mariano Fernández-López, Asunción Gómez-Pérez and Mª Carmen Suárez Figuereoa’s work 
34 
W3C MEREOLOGY USE CASES: INVENTORY OF 
PIECES IN A FACTORY 
A parts inventory for the devices made in a factory in which we want to be able to find the "explosion" of 
parts required (i.e. for each part we can see the sub-parts).
